document_data.name: Triumph Exemplar
document_data.mainbody: '''''Triumph Exemplar''''' was a famous historical record of ancient [[Netheril]]'s wars.
document_data.Description: The book possessed beaten [[gold]] covers with [[platinum]] edging, and was hand-lettered in the [[Loross]] language.
document_data.Contents: ''Triumph Exemplar'' contained extensive accounts of Netheril's wars and conflicts. One such chronicle was the legendary [[Last Stand at Humaithira]], the brutal battle between Strategor [[Matick]] [[Netherese]] army and the invading [[giant]]s of Thane [[Blóta]] of [[Skammháls]]. Though Matick was slain and his army destroyed, he inflicted heavy casualties on the enemy and won time for reinforcements to gather and later defeat the giants.
document_data.History: Published in [[221 DR]], ''Triumph Exemplar'' and its accounts of Strategor Matick were a foundational text to be read at [[Cormyr]]'s [[Academy of Lords]] during the 4{{th}} century [[DR]].
